pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later

  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
